pullrequest.title: BULLET: Contact points on surface should be processed as well

content.raw:
I tried the following on Gazebo 7, without applying this change:

1. Start Gazebo with bullet
1. Insert a sphere
1. View wireframe, view contacts
1. Change gravity on the left panel to [0, 3, 9.8]
1. Sphere rolls and I can see contacts
content.html:
I tried the following on Gazebo 7, without applying this change:

  1. Start Gazebo with bullet
  2. Insert a sphere
  3. View wireframe, view contacts
  4. Change gravity on the left panel to [0, 3, 9.8]
  5. Sphere rolls and I can see contacts
